Index.meta_title: Income Shield - Financial Protection for Tech Professionals During Layoffs
Index.meta_description: Income Shield provides financial security for tech professionals with layoff insurance that replaces a portion of your income when you need it most.

Hero.title: Protect your income with <important>layoff insurance</important> designed for tech workers.
Hero.description: Income Shield provides financial security with coverage that replaces up to 80% of your income if you're laid off, giving you time to find your next opportunity.

Features.section_title: Financial Security When You Need It Most
Features.section_description: Income Shield provides comprehensive layoff protection designed specifically for tech professionals facing industry volatility.
Features.feature_description: Our streamlined process ensures you get financial support quickly when you need it most, without complicated paperwork or lengthy approval processes.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Coverage That's Right For You
Pricing.section_description: We offer flexible coverage options to match your financial needs and career goals with affordable monthly premiums.

FAQ.answer1: Income Shield provides financial protection by replacing a portion of your income if you're laid off from your tech job. Once your claim is approved, you'll receive regular payments for your coverage period (3, 6, or 9 months based on your plan) to help cover expenses while you search for a new position.
FAQ.question2: Who is eligible for Income Shield coverage?
FAQ.answer2: Income Shield is available to full-time technology professionals employed for at least 6 months at their current company. Coverage is available for software engineers, product managers, designers, data scientists, and other tech roles.
FAQ.answer3: Premiums vary based on your current salary, role, location, and selected coverage period. Use our premium calculator to get a personalized quote based on your specific situation.
FAQ.question4: What's not covered by Income Shield?
FAQ.answer4: Income Shield covers involuntary layoffs due to company downsizing, reorganization, or closure. It does not cover termination for cause, voluntary resignation, or temporary/seasonal employment endings.
FAQ.question5: How quickly can I file a claim?
FAQ.answer5: You can file a claim immediately after being laid off. Our streamlined process requires minimal documentation, and approved claims begin paying out within 7 days for Basic plans, 3 days for Standard plans, and just 1 day for Premium plans.

CTA.title: Ready to protect your financial future?
CTA.description: Calculate your premium today and secure income protection that gives you peace of mind.
